meanings.definition: Lowest in position or rank; lowest in order.
meanings.sent1: The undermost shelf held the heaviest books.
meanings.sent2: The undermost layer of the cake was the most delicious.
meanings.sent3: The undermost step on the ladder was too slippery to climb.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the undermost layer of her personality.
meanings.sent5: The undermost drawer in the cabinet was filled with old photographs.

meanings.definition: Situated beneath or below something else.
meanings.sent1: The undermost rock in the pile supported the entire structure.
meanings.sent2: The undermost floor of the building was the coolest in summer.
meanings.sent3: The undermost seat on the bus had the best view of the city.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were buried undermost in his heart, waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The undermost layer of the ocean hides many mysteries.
